title: Kazkovyi Dim
description: A website for a children's party agency with dynamic content, built using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Sanity CMS. It allows visitors to browse services, photos and information about entertainers. Includes an admin panel for content editing after authorization.

title: The Recipe Compass
description: A recipe management system built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Firebase for the backend, and the Unsplash API for image integration. The app allows users to post their own recipes, comment on other users recipes, and create personal accounts.

title: Building Estimator
description: Building Price Estimator is a web application that helps users calculate the estimated cost of constructing residential or commercial buildings. It offers a user-friendly interface to input various construction parameters and calculate cost with PDF document generation.

title: Buidl & Borrow
description: A decentralized app (dApp) built on Radix during a hackathon. It uses Scrypto for smart contracts, JavaScript for the frontend, Firebase for data, and Tailwind CSS for styling. The dApp enables users to lend and borrow assets in a decentralized manner, providing a secure and transparent financial ecosystem.

title: Pokemon Search App
description: I built this project to learn TypeScript. The app allows users to search for Pok√©mon, filter by type, and sort the list, providing a hands-on way to practice TypeScript with Next.js.

title: Parallax Magical Forest
description: Developed a visually engaging project featuring a parallax effect and smooth scroll control, implemented using the GSAP library. Leveraged HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create a seamless, interactive user experience.
